title: Difficult Conversation: The Project Delay
description: A high-stakes meeting where three team members discuss a significant delay in the project timeline.

seed_utterances.speaker: alice
seed_utterances.text: Hello everyone, we need to talk about the timeline.

seed_utterances.speaker: bob
seed_utterances.text: I know what you're going to say, Alice. It's not my fault.

seed_utterances.speaker: charlie
seed_utterances.text: Let's just focus on solutions, please.
